requestBody.title: Biz member reviews and updates booking status API Trace

data.instruction: Using agents tools, create a biz representing The SLA / Service-Guarantee Credit. Use name/slug derived from saga context.
data.expectedResult: Biz is created, owner is auto-added as member with owner role, and biz id is captured.

data.instruction: Upload snapshots for critical steps and submit final markdown report summarizing pass/fail and discovered gaps.
data.expectedResult: Run has persisted report + snapshots in project directory and indexed metadata in DB.

view.subtitle: Step skipped: Exploratory validation step skipped by deterministic runner (semantic/manual review step).

data.instruction: Simulate this persona scenario and validate outcome deterministically: "Tries to book herself to test the flow". Capture traces and snapshots so coverage can be audited later.
data.expectedResult: Scenario behavior is either confirmed as supported or produces a clear, actionable failure report.
